com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.evaluator.PlanetEvaluator

Packages that use PlanetEvaluator
com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.evaluator Contains the code for evaluating planets and solar systems in terms of habitability, possibility of planets existing etc. 
 

Uses of PlanetEvaluator in com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.evaluator
 

Classes in com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.evaluator that implement PlanetEvaluator
 class StandardPlanetEvaluator
          Class that applies some fairly standard classifications to a planet
